text: Carlos Cedron (born 1 March 1933) is a Peruvian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Peru Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Trujillo, Peru
title: Carlos Cedron
